properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 11:07AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Cannelton Lock
Ohio River at Tell City

affecting the following counties in Indiana...Crawford...Perry and in
Kentucky...Breckinridge...Hancock.

.Heavy rain through Thursday morning will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at Tell City.
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  7:00 AM Wednesday the stage was 36.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 38.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by after midnight Thursday and
continue to rise to near 42.7 feet by Monday morning. Additional
rises are possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 44.0 feet...Bottomland on both sides floods. Water
reaches base of floodwall.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 42.0
feet on Dec 30 2015.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
